product_name: The North Face Aconcagua Down Jacket - Boys'
long_description: The North Face Aconcagua jacket for boys functions well as a layering piece or as wind- and water-resistant outerwear. Insulated with 550-fill-power down for a great warmth-to-weight ratio; down is the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulation available. Downproof, quick-drying, wind-resistant nylon shell is treated for water resistance and breathability; polyester taffeta lining slides on easily over layers. Zippered handwarmer pockets quickly warm up chilly fingers. Chin guard has soft fleece lining for added comfort; reinforced windflap behind zipper protects against cold-air penetration and zipper snags.
short_description: The North Face Aconcagua jacket for boys functions well as a layering piece or as wind- and water-resistant outerwear.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
